  • Method Details

    • createAccount

      public Response createAccount(AccountDto accountDto)
      Creates an account based on the provided accountDto.
      Specified by:
      createAccount in interface AccountService
      Parameters:
      accountDto - The accountDto containing the necessary information to create an account.
      Returns:
      The response indicating the result of the account creation.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFound - If the user associated with the accountDto does not exist.
      ResourceConflict - If an account with the same userId and accountType already exists.

    • updateStatus

      public Response updateStatus(String accountNumber, AccountStatusUpdate accountUpdate)
      Updates the status of an account.
      Specified by:
      updateStatus in interface AccountService
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The account number of the account to update.
      accountUpdate - The account status update object.
      Returns:
      The response indicating the result of the update.
      Throws:
      AccountStatusException - If the account is inactive or closed.
      InSufficientFunds - If the account balance is below the minimum required balance.
      ResourceNotFound - If the account could not be found.

    • readAccountByAccountNumber

      public AccountDto readAccountByAccountNumber(String accountNumber)
      Description copied from interface: AccountService
      Retrieves an account by its account number.
      Specified by:
      readAccountByAccountNumber in interface AccountService
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The account number to search for.
      Returns:
      The account DTO if found, or null if not found.

    • updateAccount

      public Response updateAccount(String accountNumber, AccountDto accountDto)
      Updates an account with the provided account number and account DTO.
      Specified by:
      updateAccount in interface AccountService
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The account number of the account to be updated.
      accountDto - The account DTO containing the updated account information.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success or failure of the account update.
      Throws:
      AccountStatusException - If the account is inactive or closed.
      ResourceNotFound - If the account is not found on the server.

    • getBalance

      public String getBalance(String accountNumber)
      Retrieves the balance for a given account number.
      Specified by:
      getBalance in interface AccountService
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The account number to retrieve the balance for.
      Returns:
      The balance of the account as a string.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFound - if the account with the given account number is not found.

    • getTransactionsFromAccountId

      public List<TransactionResponse> getTransactionsFromAccountId(String accountId)
      Retrieves a list of transaction responses from the given account ID.
      Specified by:
      getTransactionsFromAccountId in interface AccountService
      Parameters:
      accountId - The ID of the account to retrieve transactions from
      Returns:
      A list of transaction responses

    • closeAccount

      public Response closeAccount(String accountNumber)
      Closes the account with the specified account number.
      Specified by:
      closeAccount in interface AccountService
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The account number of the account to be closed.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the result of the operation.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFound - If the account with the specified account number is not found.
      AccountClosingException - If the balance of the account is not zero.

    • readAccountByUserId

      public AccountDto readAccountByUserId(Long userId)
      Read the account details for a given user ID.
      Specified by:
      readAccountByUserId in interface AccountService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the account details as an AccountDto object
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFound - if no account is found for the user
      AccountStatusException - if the account is inactive or closed
